title: Private Island Owners Fret About Climate Change
text: BING NEWS: Greens senator Larissa Waters attacked after invoking Pope on climate change – as it happened Pitcairn Island, a tiny speck in the Pacific ... which is a secondary forum to the house, moving a private members motion on funding for science, research and innovation.
